backend/main.mo: Defines player, team, budget, and user profile types with authorization checks, and provides CRUD operations plus profile and team-access logic using persistent maps.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file defining root element and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for login, team, and admin pages with a root layout handling profile setup display.
frontend/src/components/AdminHeader.tsx: Admin header component showing admin info and providing logout behavior with styled UI elements.
frontend/src/components/PlayerManagement: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting players with dialogs and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first‑time users to submit their display name, saving the profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/TeamHeader.tsx: Team dashboard header showing team name and remaining purse with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/TeamManagement.t: React UI for creating teams, updating purses, and assigning or removing players using query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for players, teams, budgets, and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard that redirects by role and shows tabs for managing players and teams.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity and redirecting users based on their stored profile.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboardPage.tsx: React page showing a team’s dashboard, fetching user profile, team data, purse info, and rendering stats and tables with redirects for unauthenticated or admin users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, existing features, and pending feature requests for a cricket auction system.
